description:
Observations to the City of London in connection with redevelopment and construction of a 50 storey building for B1 use, including Class A use at ground and lower ground floor levels, Class A3 use at ground level and level 49, two levels of basement for B1 and Class A uses, parking and servicing facilities, four levels of ancillary rooftop plant and a 30m. mast, alterations to existing vehicular and pedestrian access and creation of new access arrangements including traffic management measures in Stoney Lane, relocation of existing public subway entrance, new areas of landscaping on surrounding streets and associated owrks. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  The Minerva Building - Planning                         Statement, A3 application drawings,                         Environment Statement, Environment                         Statement non technical summary,                         Townscape Assessment, Transport                         Impact Assessment, Daylight and                         Sunlight Study.
decision_conditions:
OBSERVATIONS 

 This Council wishes to makes no formal observations on the proposal.
